short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform your browsing experience with TabFan.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your browsing experience with TabFan, an innovative Chrome extension that organizes your tabs into a beautiful, interactive fan structure inspired by traditional Chinese design.
Key Features:

Intuitive Fan Interface: Access all your tabs in a visually appealing, easy-to-navigate fan layout.
Quick Tab Switching: Effortlessly switch between tabs with a single click on the fan blades.
Smart Tab Management: Pin, close, or create new tabs directly from the fan interface.
Customizable Position: Choose between top-middle and center positions for your fan (with more options coming soon!).
Tab Counter: Always know how many tabs you have open at a glance.
Seamless Integration: Works on all web pages without disrupting your browsing experience.

How to Use:

Install the TabFan extension from the Chrome Web Store.
Click the TabFan icon in your browser toolbar to set your preferred fan position.
On any web page, click the fan icon that appears to expand or collapse your tab fan.
Interact with your tabs through the elegant fan interface:

Click a fan blade to switch to that tab
Use the pin icon to pin/unpin tabs
Click the close icon to close tabs
Use the "+" blade to open a new tab



Experience a new level of tab organization with TabFan. Download now and bring harmony to your browsing chaos!
